snippet: Marc Gasol scored 23 points as Memphis edged the Clippers in Los Angeles, ensuring that their playoff series will be decided on the Grizzlies’ home court.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Memphis Grizzles rally in the fourth quarter to beat the Los Angeles Clippers, 90-88, forcing a decisive Game 7 in their first-round Western Conference series; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marc Gasol scored 23 points as Memphis edged the Clippers in Los Angeles, ensuring that their playoff series will be decided on the Grizzlies’ home court.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs - Grizzlies Beat Clippers to Force Game 7
headline.main: Grizzlies Win and Go Home for Game 7
headline.print_headline: Grizzlies Win And Go Home For Game 7
